brainly_data.question: What was the first comprehensive system of social welfare pass in american history
brainly_data.subject: History

all_answers.question: What was the first comprehensive system of social welfare pass in american history
all_answers.subject: History
all_answers.text: The first social welfare system to be established on a national level in the US was introduced in 1935. It was put in place under President Franklin D. Roosevelt and focused on providing relief for millions of unemployed Americans after the Great Depression.
